name: vscode-vue-files
description: Quickly create Vue files with different templates

scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run compile

vscode-vue-files.menu.showCompositionApi.description: Show menu options that use Composition API (Setup) template

vscode-vue-files.menu.showOptionsApi.description: Show menu options that use Options API template

vscode-vue-files.menu.showTypescript.description: Show menu options that use Typescript as the Script language

vscode-vue-files.menu.showJavascript.description: Show menu options that use Javascript as the Script language

vscode-vue-files.menu.showCss.description: Show menu options that use CSS as the Style language

vscode-vue-files.menu.showScss.description: Show menu options that use SCSS as the Style language

vscode-vue-files.fileStructure.scriptTag.description: The Script tag will come first in the file, otherwise Template tag comes first

vscode-vue-files.template.showV-ModelTem.description: Generates a working V-Model structure in the new file (Props, Emits, and Computed options must be enabled to be functional)

vscode-vue-files.option.showNameScriptOp.description: Generates the "Name" option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.option.showComponentsSc.description: Generates the "Components" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.option.showDirectivesSc.description: Generates the "Directives" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.option.showExtendsScrip.description: Generates the "Extends" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.option.showMixinsScript.description: Generates the "Mixins" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.option.showProvideInjec.description: Generates the "Provide/Inject" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.option.showInheritAttri.description: Generates the "Inherit Attributes" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.option.showPropsScriptO.description: Generates the "Props" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.option.showEmitsScriptO.description: Generates the "Emits" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.option.showSetupScriptO.description: Generates the "Setup" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.option.showDataScriptOp.description: Generates the "Data" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.option.showComputedScri.description: Generates the "Computed" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.option.showWatchScriptO.description: Generates the "Watch" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.option.showMethodsScrip.description: Generates the "Methods" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.lifecycle.showLifecycle.description: Generates the lifecycle hooks script options in the new file script tag, when enabled, only the below active options will be displayed, otherwise all will be hidden

vscode-vue-files.lifecycle.showBeforeCre.description: Generates the "Before Create" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.lifecycle.showCreatedSc.description: Generates the "Created" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.lifecycle.showBeforeMou.description: Generates the "Before Mount" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.lifecycle.showMountedSc.description: Generates the "Mounted" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.lifecycle.showBeforeUpd.description: Generates the "Before Update" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.lifecycle.showUpdatedSc.description: Generates the "Updated" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.lifecycle.showActivated.description: Generates the "Activated" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.lifecycle.showDeactivat.description: Generates the "Deactivated" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.lifecycle.showBeforeUnm.description: Generates the "Before Unmount" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.lifecycle.showUnmounted.description: Generates the "Unmounted" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.lifecycle.showErrorCapt.description: Generates the "Error Captured" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.lifecycle.showRenderTra.description: Generates the "Render Tracked" script option in the new file script tag

vscode-vue-files.lifecycle.showRenderTri.description: Generates the "Render Triggered" script option in the new file script tag

commands.title: Create New Composition API (Setup + TS + SCSS)
Create New Composition API (Setup + TS + CSS)
Create New Composition API (Setup + JS + SCSS)
Create New Composition API (Setup + JS + CSS)
